mapper.insert:
SELECT seq_live_lesson.nextval FROM dual
INSERT INTO live_lesson ( lesson_id, member_id, title, description, status, stream_key, broadcast_url, thumbnail_url, created_at, updated_at ) VALUES ( #{liveId}, #{lessonId}, #{memberId}, #{title}, #{description}, #{status}, #{streamKey}, #{broadcastUrl}, #{thumbnailUrl}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE )
mapper.select: SELECT l.lived_id AS liveId, l.title AS title, l.stream_key AS streamKey, m.name AS instructorName, l.thumbnail_url AS thumbnailUrl, l.broadcast_url AS broadcastUrl, l.status AS status, TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, l.created_at, NOW()) AS minutesAgo FROM live_lesson l JOIN member m ON l.member_id = m.member_id WHERE l.status = 'ON_AIR' AND l.member_id = #{memberId}

SELECT l.lived_id AS liveId, l.title AS title, l.stream_key AS streamKey, m.name AS instructorName, l.thumbnail_url AS thumbnailUrl, l.broadcast_url AS broadcastUrl, l.status AS status, TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, l.created_at, NOW()) AS minutesAgo FROM live_lesson l JOIN member m ON l.member_id = m.member_id WHERE l.status = 'ON_AIR' AND l.member_id != #{memberId}

SELECT l.lived_id AS liveId, l.title AS title, l.description AS description, l.stream_key AS streamKey, m.name AS instructorName, l.thumbnail_url AS thumbnailUrl, l.broadcast_url AS broadcastUrl, l.status AS status, l.created_at AS createdAt, TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, l.created_at, NOW()) AS minutesAgo, CASE WHEN l.member_id = #{memberId} THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS isEnrolled FROM live_lesson l JOIN member m ON l.member_id = m.member_id WHERE l.live_id = #{liveId}

SELECT lived_id AS liveId, member_id AS memberId, lesson_id AS lessonId, title AS title, description AS description, stream_key AS streamKey, thumbnail_url AS thumbnailUrl, broadcast_url AS broadcastUrl, status AS status FROM live_lesson WHERE live_id = #{liveId}
SELECT live_id FROM live_lesson WHERE status = 'ON_AIR'
